scenes.text: Hi, this is the netball society. With 8 teams playing weekly, including 6 BUCS teams and 2 IMG teams, CUNC is a welcoming and friendly club focused on competing at the highest level as well as having fun off the court!

Regular Weekly Training:
MONDAY –
6:45 - 7:45am:
1s and 2s
Strength and Conditioning @ Park Place

7 - 8pm:
1s and 2s
Court session @ Talybont

7 - 8pm:
3s - 6s
Fitness @ Talybont

TUESDAY –
7 - 8am:
1s - 9s (shooters only)
@ Talybont

7 - 8am:
1s and 2s
Training @ Talybont

7 - 8pm:
7s and 8s (IMG)
Training @ Talybont

WEDNESDAY –
1s - 9s
Game Day (Home/Away)

FRIDAY –
6:45 - 8am:
1s and 2s 
Strength and Conditioning @ Park Place

SUNDAY –
6 - 8pm:
1s - 6s
Court Session @ Talybont

Netball Club Standard Membership is £70.00
Netball Club Social Membership is £15.00
Netball Club Erasmus Membership is £35.00
Netball Club IMG Team Membership is £55.00
You also need the AU Membership before purchasing a club membership.

The Netball Club has weekly socials on a Wednesday held at Misfits, one of our sponsors this year. As well as this, we host a Christmas Meal, charity ball and an end of year awards at Revs – another one of our sponsors this year. As a club this year we have chosen to support a variety of charities. Our two fundraising secs this year have amazing ideas for this year which will be released throughout the year.
